name: sukiyaki
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
a Japanese dish consisting of very thinly sliced beef or other meat and vegetables, cooked together in soy sauce and other spices : We had tempura vegetables, miso soup, and sukiyaki. Slice the onions and boil them in the sukiyaki sauce.
More examplesFewer examplesThe meat and poultry dishes include ginger chicken and beef sukiyaki.The beef in the sukiyaki was simmered at our table with vegetables and a soy-ginger broth.At the sukiyaki table, diners should not dip their chopsticks into the sauce.
